Html:
Hi , i downloaded nerddinner project but i am geteing this error  the project type is not suported by this installation

 

i have vs2009 installed on my machine  along with asp.net mvc 1.0 , windows XP service pack 2 ,  i wewnt throu pages but could find support for this solution

 pls let me know what i am misisng

with regards

Sounds like you don't really have ASP.NET MVC installed. Can you go File|NewProject and start and run an MVC site?

On Fri, Aug 28, 2009 at 4:43 AM, muddasirqidwai <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: muddasirqidwai

In my case I had to change the value of the ProjectGuids in the project file as suggested in this post

http://www.stuffthatjustworks.com/How+To+Fix+Xcsproj+Cannot+Be+Opened+The+Project+Type+Is+Not+Supported+By+This+Installation.aspx
